compatibility.notes: The NASA-1.3 license is permissive and allows for broad use, modification, and distribution. It is compatible with other permissive licenses but incompatible with copyleft licenses.

key_requirements: Include the license text in all distributions of the Subject Software.
Include copyright notices in all copies or substantial portions of the Subject Software.
Provide notice of any modifications made to the Subject Software.
